summary: This module contains unit tests that verify the fallback mode notification system, checking how different notification settings (ignore, print, raise, warn) respond, ensuring proper vectorization handling, and validating error state management utilities.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and predictable behavior of fallback notifications in the CuPy library, so developers receive appropriate feedback (or suppression) when operations revert to NumPy, enhancing robustness and user experience.
